Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can show the string telephone device that connects the two students.
The student can illustrate that the string telephone uses sound to send messages between the students.
The student can include features in the drawing that demonstrate the use of tools and materials to solve the communication problem.
The student can represent in the drawing how different technologies, like the string telephone, help people communicate.
